mapper.select: select u.pic, e.id ,u.name, e.department, e.position, u.email, u.phone, e.auth from employee e inner join users u on e.user_id = u.id where e.company_id = #{companyId} and e.status = 0 order by u.name
select count (*) as countValue from employee e inner join users u on e.user_id = u.id WHERE e.company_id = #{companyId} and e.status = 0
select u.pic, e.id ,u.name, e.department, e.position, u.email, u.phone, e.auth from employee e inner join users u on e.user_id = u.id where e.company_id = #{companyId} and e.status=1 order by u.name
select count (*) as countStopValue from employee e inner join users u on e.user_id = u.id WHERE e.company_id = #{companyId} and e.status=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (id, company_id, user_id) VALUES (employee_id.nextval, #{companyId}, #{userId} )
